"Python 3" "from datetime import datetime date_format = '%d/%m/%Y' tw_end_date = datetime.strptime('31/12/2021', date_format) # Time window end def len_years_serie(installation_date, suspension_date): if not installation_date: installation_date = tw_end_date suspension_date = tw_end_date if not suspension_date: suspension_date = tw_end_date diff_date = suspension_date - installation_date return float(diff_date.days)/365" Text NO_ENFORCE_DOMAINS
